film.title: The Secret
film.summary: A wife and mother passes away, and spirit returns in her daughter's body.

guestOne.name: Topher Grace
guestOne.bio: Topher Grace is an American actor. He is known for playing Eric Forman in the Fox sitcom That ’70s Show, Eddie Brock / Venom in Sam Raimi‘s film Spider-Man 3, and David Duke in Spike Lee‘s film BlacKkKlansman. He is also the host of the podcast Minor Adventures with Topher Grace.

guestTwo.name: Joel Kim Booster
guestTwo.bio: Joel Kim Booster is a writer and a comedian, and without your validation he will cease to exist entirely.

results.episodeDescription: Topher Grace (Minor Adventures with Topher Grace) and Joel Kim Booster (Unsend) joins Paul and Jason to discuss the 2007 french thriller The Secret starring David Duchovny. They do their best to unpack the insane premise of a mother’s spirit going into her daughter’s body. Plus, June shares her own thoughts on the film.
